item.name: New Incognito Window (CTRL+SHIFT+N)
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::N, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Reopen Closed Tab (CTRL+SHIFT+T)
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::T, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::T, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Always Show Bookmarks Bar (CTRL+SHIFT+B)
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::B, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT

item.name: Use Forward Delete as Delete Files
Cmd+N to new folder | Cmd+Shift+N to new window
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::N, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::N, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,

item.name: Imported - For PC Users
Use PC Style Home/End #2
item.appendix: (Use Home and End key to beginning-of-line/end-of-line.)
(+ Change Home to Control+A in Emacs,Terminal,X11)
(+ Change End to Control+E in Emacs,Terminal,X11)

block.only: BLUEFISH, EXCEL, IntelliJ, PhpStorm, RubyMine, JetBrainsApps, ANDROID_STUDIO,

item.block: {{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS }} {{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_EXTRA }} __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_HOME, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_HOME, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_END, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_END, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_HOME, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_END, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.item:
Use PC Style PageUp/PageDown (behave like Option+PageUp/PageDown)
{{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS_DESCRIPTION }} private.remap.pclikepageupdown_except_emacs
{{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS }},
WORD, EXCEL, POWERPOINT, OUTLOOK, JetBrainsApps
{{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_EXTRA }} __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_PAGEUP, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::PAGEUP, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L __KeyToKey__ FROMKEYCODE_PAGEDOWN, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::PAGEDOWN, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

Use PC Style Copy/Paste (Control+C to Command_L+C) (Control+V to Command_L+V) (Control+X to Command_L+X)
{{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS_DESCRIPTION }} private.remap.pc_style_copy_paste {{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS }} {{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_EXTRA }}
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::C, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::V, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::V, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::X, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::X, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L,

item.name: Use PC Style Redo
item.modifier_not: ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R,

item.name: Use PC Style Open In New Tab (Browser only) Control+LeftClick to Command+LeftClick

item.item:
Use PC Style Find (Control+F to Command_L+F) (Control+G to Command_L+G) (F3 to Command_L+G) (Control+F3 to Shift+Command_L+G)
{{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS_DESCRIPTION }} private.remap.find_winstyle_no_term {{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_APPS }} {{ PC_STYLE_BINDINGS_IGNORE_EXTRA }} __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::G, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::G, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F3, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL, KeyCode::G, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F3, KeyCode::G, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Use PC Style Alt+F4
item.appendix: Disable Cmd+Q, remap Alt/Cmd+F4 to Cmd+Q
